forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of showers. Low 2C.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers. Lows overnight in the upper 30s.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by some light rain later in the day. High 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
